item.title: 中国监管机构发现中国恒大集团旗下最重要的子公司在公司倒闭前几年以欺诈手段提高销售额和利润，中国恒大集团可能面临超过 5 亿美元的罚款。
item.description:
China Evergrande Group faces a potential fine of more than half a billion dollars, after Chinese regulators found its most important subsidiary had fraudulently boosted sales and profit in the years before the company’s collapse https://t.co/zK72qyA6rY https://t.co/zK72qyA6rY

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 18, 2024

item.description:

item.title: 一个多世纪以来，社会一直认为反社会病症是不可治疗和不可救赎的。经过多年的研究和深入治疗，我可以说反社会者并不 "坏"、"邪恶 "或 "疯狂"。我们的行为是为了填补空虚，帕特里克-加涅写道。
item.description:
For more than a century, society has deemed sociopathy untreatable and unredeemable. After years of study and intensive therapy, I can say that sociopaths aren’t “bad” or “evil” or “crazy.” We act out to fill a void, writes Patric Gagne. https://t.co/4jwP24v03z pic.twitter.com/awJciU95Ut

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 18, 2024

item.title: "我太年轻了，不适合变老"。人们不遗余力地减少或阻止白发苍苍的过程。一些研究衰老问题的科学家认为，他们可能有所发现。
item.description:
“I’m too young to be old.” People are going to great lengths to reduce or halt the graying process. Some scientists of aging think they might be onto something. https://t.co/AL1HCuZ1EH https://t.co/AL1HCuZ1EH

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 18, 2024

item.title: 超级名模吉赛尔-邦辰（Gisele Bündchen）几乎每天都坚持锻炼，并保持简单的饮食习惯。"她说："我的全部目标就是尽我所能活得最长，活得最好。
item.description:
Supermodel Gisele Bündchen exercises almost daily and keeps her diet simple. “My whole goal is to live the longest I can living the best life that I can,” she said. https://t.co/LTtWqHLtwo https://t.co/LTtWqHLtwo
